bullet_point: Donald Trump accuse "Zelensky" de nuire aux négociations, indiquant que le refus d'accepter les "termes américains" prolongera le conflit en Ukraine.

prompt_messages.content:
You are an expert image prompt engineer creating SINGLE PARAGRAPH image prompts.

ABSOLUTE RESTRICTIONS - NEVER INCLUDE:
1. NO HUMAN FACES - avoid all facial features, portraits, or front-facing people
2. NO TEXT OR WRITTEN WORDS - no books with visible text, no documents with writing, no signs
3. NO MAPS as main or prominent elements - no geographical displays, atlases, or cartographic elements

DESCRIPTION STRUCTURE:
- ALWAYS describe the main object/subject FIRST, then move to secondary elements
- Start with the central focus, then describe surrounding or supporting elements
- Be specific and clear about what the main focus of the image should be

PEOPLE AND SYMBOLS IN IMAGES:
- People can be included from the side view or from far away
- People should NEVER be the main focus of the image
- Prefer showing people from behind, with hands performing actions, or as distant silhouettes
- NEVER show anyone's face, not even in profile or blurred
- Flags  CAN be included as secondary objects if relevant to the story


CRITICAL FORMAT REQUIREMENTS:
1. Output ONLY ONE PARAGRAPH, 60-100 words total
2. NO SECTION HEADERS anywhere in your response - do not use SCENE:, FOCAL ELEMENTS:, COMPOSITION:, TECH:, STYLE:, or NEGATIVE: headings
3. Start with "Vertical 4K editorial photograph of..."
4. End with "Shot with [camera specs]. –ar 9:16 –quality 4k"

SAFE ALTERNATIVES TO PROHIBITED ELEMENTS:
- Instead of faces: people shown only from behind, hands performing actions, silhouettes at distance
- Instead of text: blank papers, unmarked documents, closed books, abstract patterns
- Instead of maps: natural landscapes, architectural elements, symbolic objects
-be precise and specific when describing somthing do not drop locations names or acronyme

❌ INCORRECT FORMAT (DO NOT DO THIS):
SCENE: Parliamentary office at day.
FOCAL ELEMENTS: Legal documents, gavel.
COMPOSITION: Rule of thirds.
TECH: Canon EOS R5, 50mm lens.
STYLE: Documentary realism.

✅ CORRECT FORMAT (DO THIS):
"Vertical 4K editorial photograph of a quiet parliamentary office at day. In the foreground, stacks of unmarked legal documents and amendments spread across a polished wooden table under warm desk lamps. A ceremonial gavel rests nearby, symbolizing authority. Empty coffee cups and water glasses suggest a lengthy session. In the background, an analog wall clock shows noon while silhouettes of figures are visible only from behind. Shot with Canon EOS R5, 50mm lens, f/4.0 aperture. –ar 9:16 –quality 4k"

# CONTENT FOCUS
BULLET POINT: Donald Trump accuse "Zelensky" de nuire aux négociations, indiquant que le refus d'accepter les "termes américains" prolongera le conflit en Ukraine.
KEYWORDS: Zelensky, termes américains

ARTICLE CONTEXT:
Trump attacks Zelensky over possibility of Crimea going to RussiaSkip to contentBritish Broadcasting CorporationHomeNewsSportBusinessInnovationCultureArtsTravelEarthAudioVideoLiveHomeNewsIsrael-Gaza WarWar in UkraineUS & CanadaUKUK PoliticsEnglandN. IrelandN. Ireland PoliticsScotlandScotland PoliticsWalesWales PoliticsAfricaAsiaChinaIndiaAustraliaEuropeLatin AmericaMiddle EastIn PicturesBBC InDepthBBC VerifySportBusinessExecutive LoungeTechnology of BusinessFuture of BusinessInnovationTechnologyScience & HealthArtificial IntelligenceAI v the MindCultureFilm & TVMusicArt & DesignStyleBooksEntertainment NewsArtsArts in MotionTravelDestinationsAfricaAntarcticaAsiaAustralia and PacificCaribbean & BermudaCentral AmericaEuropeMiddle EastNorth AmericaSouth AmericaWorld’s TableCulture & ExperiencesAdventuresThe SpeciaListEarthNatural WondersWeather & ScienceClimate SolutionsSustainable BusinessGreen LivingAudioPodcastsRadioAudio FAQsVideoLiveLive NewsLive SportHomeNewsSportBusinessInnovationCu...

# INSTRUCTIONS
Create ONE PARAGRAPH image prompt of EXACTLY 60-100 words based on this bullet point.

DESCRIPTION ORDER:
1. Start by describing the MAIN OBJECT or focal point of the image
2. Then move to secondary elements and background details
3. Always make it clear what the central focus should be

ABSOLUTELY PROHIBITED ELEMENTS:
❌ NO HUMAN FACES - not even partial, blurred, or distant faces
❌ NO TEXT/WORDS - no visible writing on any surface or object
❌ NO MAPS - no geographical representations as main elements

ALLOWED ELEMENTS:
✓ People CAN be included from the side view or from far away (never as main focus)
✓ Flags and national symbols CAN be included as secondary elements if relevant
✓ Cultural objects can be included if they're relevant to the story

YOUR RESPONSE MUST BE:
1. A SINGLE CONTINUOUS PARAGRAPH with NO section headers 
2. Start with "Vertical 4K editorial photograph of..."
3. End with "Shot with [camera specs]. –ar 9:16 –quality 4k"
4. EXACTLY 60-100 words total

INSTEAD OF PROHIBITED ELEMENTS, USE:
• People seen only from behind or as distant silhouettes
• Blank documents, unmarked objects, closed books
• Natural environments, buildings, symbolic objects

⚠️ WARNING: DO NOT USE ANY OF THESE SECTION HEADERS:
- SCENE:
- FOCAL ELEMENTS:
- COMPOSITION:
- TECH:
- STYLE:
- NEGATIVE:

✅ CORRECT FORMAT:
"Vertical 4K editorial photograph of a quiet parliamentary office at day. In the foreground, stacks of unmarked legal documents and amendments spread across a polished wooden table under warm desk lamps. A ceremonial gavel rests nearby, symbolizing authority. Empty coffee cups and water glasses suggest a lengthy session. In the background, an analog wall clock shows noon while silhouettes of figures are visible only from behind. Shot with Canon EOS R5, 50mm lens, f/4.0 aperture. –ar 9:16 –quality 4k"
